title: Paris-Roubaix: Van der Poel Hits Historic Triple after Poga훾ar Crashes out of Cobbled Contention
content:
Poga훾ar overshoots corner and crashes deep into the final of wild debut at 'Hell of the North,' holds off chase group for second place on all-attacking debut.

Read the full article at Paris-Roubaix: Van der Poel Hits Historic Triple after Poga훾ar Crashes out of Cobbled Contention on Velo.
